message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this incredible product. I think it would be a great fit for you, and I'm willing to make a one-time offer. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $900000. This is a fantastic deal, considering the product's value to you is $1500000. I'm confident you'll love it, and I'm willing to make a sacrifice to get it into your hands. What do you think?
